A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi is a bait and switch.

Subversion: "the tendency or intention to subvert or overthrow\, destroy\, or undermine an established or existing system or a set of beliefs."

Bait and switch: "the ploy of offering a person something desirable to gain favor\, and then thwarting expectations with something less desirable."

Subverting expectations\, Rian? Isn't that what you did? With pride\, I may add.

The same expectations you created with the trailers? Isn't that bait and switch?

BAIT AND SWITCH IS ILLEGAL IN THE USA!!!!

What about starting a Class Action against Disney? We ALL should sue Disney and get our money back.
